name: Nemesis 2
overview: This version is also based on the original MSX1 classic. For some reason the game always run in "Penguin mode" which was originally unlocked by plugging a Penguin Adventure cartridge in the second cartridge slot of a MSX. This could be an intentional modification that Zemina made, or perhaps a side-effect of the game reading unexpected data and interpreting it as Penguin Adventure.
